subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the dxScrollable UI component.

subMembers.name: bounceEnabled
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether to enable or disable the bounce-back effect.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: A string value specifying the available scrolling directions.

subMembers.name: disabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the UI component responds to user interaction.

subMembers.name: scrollByContent
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not an end user can scroll the UI component content swiping it up or down. Applies only if [useNative] is **false**

subMembers.name: scrollByThumb
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can scroll the content with the scrollbar. Applies only if [useNative] is **false**.

subMembers.name: showScrollbar
subMembers.description: Specifies when the UI component shows the scrollbar.

subMembers.name: useNative
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to use native or simulated scrolling.

properties.name: dxScrollable
properties.description: A UI component used to display scrollable content.

Methods.name: scrollBy(distance)
Methods.description: Scrolls the content by a specific distance.

Methods.name: scrollHeight()
Methods.description: Gets the scrollable content's height in pixels.

Methods.name: scrollTo(targetLocation)
Methods.description: Scrolls the content to a specific position.

Methods.name: scrollWidth()
Methods.description: Gets the scrollable content's width in pixels.

Events.name: onScroll
Events.description: A function that is executed on each scroll gesture.

Events.name: onUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed each time the UI component is updated.

Events.name: updated
Events.description: Raised each time the UI component is updated.
